Array.description: Known size array whose elements are of the same type.
Array.title: Array

CFG.description: A dataflow node which is defined by a child CFG.
CFG.title: CFG

Call.description: Operation to call a function directly. The first port is connected to the def/declare of the function being called directly, with a `Static<FunctionType>` edge. The signature of the remaining ports matches the function being called.
Call.title: Call

CallIndirect.description:
Call a function indirectly.

Like call, but the first input is a standard dataflow graph type.
CallIndirect.title: CallIndirect

Case.description: Case ops - nodes valid inside Conditional nodes.
Case.title: Case

Conditional.description: Conditional operation, defined by child `Case` nodes for each branch.

sum_rows.description: The possible rows of the Sum input
sum_rows.title: Sum Rows

Conditional.title: Conditional

CustomOp.description: A user-defined operation that can be downcasted by the extensions that define it.
CustomOp.title: CustomOp

DataflowBlock.description: A CFG basic block node. The signature is that of the internal Dataflow graph.
DataflowBlock.title: DataflowBlock

ExitBlock.description: The single exit node of the CFG, has no children, stores the types of the CFG node output.
ExitBlock.title: ExitBlock

ExtensionConst.description: An extension constant value, that can check it is of a given [CustomType].
ExtensionConst.title: ExtensionConst

FuncDecl.description: External function declaration, linked at runtime.
FuncDecl.title: FuncDecl

FuncDefn.description: A function definition. Children nodes are the body of the definition.
FuncDefn.title: FuncDefn

FunctionType.description: A graph encoded as a value. It contains a concrete signature and a set of required resources.
FunctionType.title: FunctionType

GeneralSum.description: General sum type that explicitly stores the types of the variants.
GeneralSum.title: GeneralSum

Input.description: An input node. The outputs of this node are the inputs to the parent node.
Input.title: Input

Lift.description: Fixes some TypeParams of a polymorphic type by providing TypeArgs.
Lift.title: Lift

LoadConstant.description: An operation that loads a static constant in to the local dataflow graph.
LoadConstant.title: LoadConstant

MakeTuple.description: An operation that packs all its inputs into a tuple.
MakeTuple.title: MakeTuple

Module.description: The root of a module, parent of all other `ModuleOp`s.
Module.title: Module

Opaque.description: An opaque operation that can be downcasted by the extensions that define it.
Opaque.title: Opaque

Output.description: An output node. The inputs are the outputs of the function.
Output.title: Output

PolyFuncType.description: A polymorphic type scheme, i.e. of a FuncDecl, FuncDefn or OpDef.  (Nodes/operations in the Hugr are not polymorphic.)
PolyFuncType.title: PolyFuncType

Sum.description: A Sum variant For any Sum type where this value meets the type of the variant indicated by the tag.
Sum.title: Sum

Tag.description: An operation that creates a tagged sum value from one of its variants.
Tag.title: Tag

UnitSum.description: Simple predicate where all variants are empty tuples.
UnitSum.title: UnitSum

UnpackTuple.description: An operation that packs all its inputs into a tuple.
UnpackTuple.title: UnpackTuple

Variable.description: A type variable identified by an index into the array of TypeParams.
Variable.title: Variable

description: A serializable representation of a Hugr.
title: Hugr
